7d8a91c9-6f26-4b57-ab66-594945ba5ece.name: Absorptive Change
7d8a91c9-6f26-4b57-ab66-594945ba5ece.notes: @Level of Absorptive Change. 1 None, 2, Light, 3, Medium, 4, Heavy, 5, Extra Heavy@

d2260ad2-6d4a-49bf-916f-03844a541a44.name: Frequency: Constantly
d2260ad2-6d4a-49bf-916f-03844a541a44.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

b48af4d1-b0a9-4ed1-8efb-5e078f74b231.name: Frequency: Hourly
b48af4d1-b0a9-4ed1-8efb-5e078f74b231.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

97bf8eac-166d-4d16-93da-70b05433e741.name: Frequency: Daily
97bf8eac-166d-4d16-93da-70b05433e741.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

e188fb2a-4a85-4401-a20d-3edcdf09c0b5.name: Frequency: Weekly
e188fb2a-4a85-4401-a20d-3edcdf09c0b5.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

b1577faa-f5c5-4c2f-8d91-2a20fac34bac.name: Frequency: Monthly
b1577faa-f5c5-4c2f-8d91-2a20fac34bac.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

e3bdc04f-e1f4-4499-95a0-af6f35ba85f0.name: Frequency: Seasonally
e3bdc04f-e1f4-4499-95a0-af6f35ba85f0.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

37a6d4a5-53e4-4ba6-8f8e-55b7c43d0686.name: Frequency: Yearly
37a6d4a5-53e4-4ba6-8f8e-55b7c43d0686.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

b2b10b7f-2ec2-49cd-9edb-0907c1ad3850.name: Aging
b2b10b7f-2ec2-49cd-9edb-0907c1ad3850.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

73f1f226-3d53-4494-90ec-0d7132a69219.name: Major
73f1f226-3d53-4494-90ec-0d7132a69219.notes: Cannot enter dwelling for the first time unless invited

3a75e94c-68fb-4eec-a419-ef7cd94e19a5.name: Oxygen Storage
3a75e94c-68fb-4eec-a419-ef7cd94e19a5.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

fa2ee12e-bb41-4606-bd0c-d1b100f4c479.name: Oxygen Storage
fa2ee12e-bb41-4606-bd0c-d1b100f4c479.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

7170d0bb-b30f-420e-af47-e2d8f231ce38.name: Oxygen Storage
7170d0bb-b30f-420e-af47-e2d8f231ce38.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

938b3957-01e6-4f97-9f66-afac8c75066b.name: Oxygen Storage
938b3957-01e6-4f97-9f66-afac8c75066b.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

a49d9d75-a0c4-4bee-afcb-99325ec389a6.name: Oxygen Storage
a49d9d75-a0c4-4bee-afcb-99325ec389a6.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

800bb9d4-6e06-4f8f-a893-a7f6c14fa14a.name: Dread
800bb9d4-6e06-4f8f-a893-a7f6c14fa14a.notes: May not come within level yards of Running water

7505c91b-c600-4ccd-9cd2-663d1806e85a.name: Dread
7505c91b-c600-4ccd-9cd2-663d1806e85a.notes: May not come within level yards of Garlic

991c2e2f-8567-4ddc-8480-3852fb4aef6b.name: Dread
991c2e2f-8567-4ddc-8480-3852fb4aef6b.notes: May not come within level yards of Religious Symbols

137a1582-ec11-4c4e-ac39-d67048df73b9.name: Diffuse
137a1582-ec11-4c4e-ac39-d67048df73b9.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

7b062c40-2334-44a5-97dd-64d653b82b0e.name: Homogenous
7b062c40-2334-44a5-97dd-64d653b82b0e.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

58b587de-cc89-48a0-b727-c532bfc764fa.name: No Blood
58b587de-cc89-48a0-b727-c532bfc764fa.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

91e33216-0b32-4e5e-980a-d5c2b66306da.name: No Brain
91e33216-0b32-4e5e-980a-d5c2b66306da.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

35e78448-a22c-4724-a361-a224b3bf1b78.name: No Eyes
35e78448-a22c-4724-a361-a224b3bf1b78.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

b10fa6f7-4d66-4fc9-b8ad-e54a843b2079.name: No Head
b10fa6f7-4d66-4fc9-b8ad-e54a843b2079.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

7b5c8b11-c869-4abf-8e69-c5b9ca0cf319.name: No Neck
7b5c8b11-c869-4abf-8e69-c5b9ca0cf319.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

320c9db3-1704-4f9d-8550-13bfc6e4472f.name: No Vitals
320c9db3-1704-4f9d-8550-13bfc6e4472f.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

f9a1b9d0-7c58-4d15-b467-def7cfeac6d2.name: Unliving
f9a1b9d0-7c58-4d15-b467-def7cfeac6d2.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

4f87de31-d376-49f7-8406-7ab4c289c8c7.name: Partial Change
4f87de31-d376-49f7-8406-7ab4c289c8c7.notes: Can turn an item you are carrying substantial without dropping it

344d96a3-3b54-4825-aefb-a7191d6c202d.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

25f47393-3b79-4bcd-aaa4-7ff342d9a6a1.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

b525f581-a940-451c-a89b-c05a88a7b96b.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

23ef80b7-a0f1-4403-9e20-67e04278d128.name: No Body Heat
23ef80b7-a0f1-4403-9e20-67e04278d128.notes: Gives +1 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from those who touch you, shake your hand, kiss you, etc.

52e38216-4550-45b0-bc86-00e56c594971.name: No Body Heat
52e38216-4550-45b0-bc86-00e56c594971.notes: Can gain warmth temporarily, such as after feeding for a vampire. Gives +1 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from those who touch you, shake your hand, kiss you, etc.

78997788-f6ea-48be-8f22-53110c23fd55.name: No Reflection
78997788-f6ea-48be-8f22-53110c23fd55.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who notice you have no reflection

2e3e17dc-3198-4c16-a960-1a0788fcf727.name: No Shadow
2e3e17dc-3198-4c16-a960-1a0788fcf727.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others that notice you have no shadow

85cc6e48-0e22-40c4-aec9-f416a611afb1.name: Pallor
85cc6e48-0e22-40c4-aec9-f416a611afb1.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who can see you without makeup in good light

ef2e1d6a-9cc7-4963-8206-e4b8964792d2.name: Pallor
ef2e1d6a-9cc7-4963-8206-e4b8964792d2.notes: Can gain the flush of life temporarily, such as after feeding for a vampire. Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who can see you without makeup in good light

0815f415-ec50-4f1d-b9bf-9913095663b7.name: Vampiric Bite
0815f415-ec50-4f1d-b9bf-9913095663b7.notes: Drains 1 HP + 1/level per second. For every 3 HP stolen, you heal 1 HP or 1 FP (your choice). Also lets you bite in combat without feeding. Add Teeth (Sharp Teeth) or Teeth (Sharp Beak) – your choice for free.
